title: Drawing, "Botanical Sketches from the Rio Magalena, Colombia", May 1853
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite as follows: groups / Rosa / Brilliant / vermillion, yellow / wild - or - false / Plantain / May -53- / May - 1853/ Rio Magdalena / Penda ; and in another hand: Bijao / Heliconia / Bijao.
description: Horizontal rectangle showing plants and details

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Botanical Sketches from the Rio Magalena, Colombia", May 1853.
May 1853. Graphite on paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-58.
